errors.rhymesSearchFailed: Failed to search in the rhymes dictionary: {error}

definition.wordNotFound: This word cannot be found in the Remède dictionary...
definition.noWordWithThisPhoneme: No words found with this pronunciation.

share.definitionDescription: The definition of word "{word}" is on Remède !
share.sheetDescription: the french grammar sheet "{name}" is on Remède !

aboutPage.description: Remède is an open source dictionary built on extern resources. Check our
aboutPage.moreInformationCredits: For more information about our data provenance, or how it is built, please visit the online documentation at

correctionPage.placeholder: Write your text here, we will correct it.
correctionPage.backToAppDisclaimer: Back to app will replaced selected text by corrected text.
correctionPage.copyAndBackToApp: Copy and get back to app
correctionPage.copyAndBackToAppDisclaimer: Copy the corrected text and get back to previous application. All you have to do is paste the text !

rhymesPage.noRhymeFound: No rhyme found for this word and these filters. Use the searchbar above to retry.
rhymesPage.searchErrored: The search in the rhyme dictionary has failed.

settingsPage.downloadDescription: The offline dictionary has been downloaded
settingsPage.downloadLongDescription: To finish its installation, please restart the application !
settingsPage.downloadFailedDescription: The offline dictionary cannot be downloaded: {error}
settingsPage.downloadingDisclaimer:
Please let this page open while the dictionary is downloading.

You must restart the application after the dictionary has been downloaded.
settingsPage.workingNormally: Everything looks ok ! You can start searching words offline !
settingsPage.problemDetected: A problem has been detected, please reinstall the dictionary or contact the support.
settingsPage.information1RemedeDictClient: Remède allows you to explore dictionaries servers using the DICT protocol.
settingsPage.information2ExploreServers: Find and explore a large amount of dictionaries servers.
settingsPage.information3SaveCustomServers: Add custom servers. Go to the settings page to enable searching from DICT servers.
settingsPage.information4HowToUse: Select "DICT servers" as  search source and browse dictionaries servers directly from Remède !
settingsPage.DICTDisclaimer: Because DICT servers only provide raw textual informations about a word, only the search functionality will work with DICT servers. Also, the definition page will be simplified.

sheetsPage.onlyWorkWithInternet: Only works with an internet connection !

landingScreen.functionalities: + 900 000 word, but also rhymes, examples, a corrector and more... Remède is much more than a dictionary !
landingScreen.openSourceDescription: Yes ! Remède is growing with his community and 100% open source !
landingScreen.tagline: Cure your French ills now with Remède !

dictClient.invalidServer: Unable to connect to the DICT server.
